CodexEntry.name: Smart Grid
CodexEntry.description: Smart Grids monitors information on energy usage to predict demand and adapt to provide efficient and reliable electricity.

CodexEntry.name: Electrofuels
CodexEntry.description: This emerging technology stores electrical energy in the chemical bonds of a renewable fuel source such as Biodiesel, Butanol or Hydrogen.

CodexEntry.name: Biodiesel
CodexEntry.description: Biodiesel fuel has similar properties to Road Diesel but is instead made of renewable organic matter. Often times, this matter is vegetable oil recycled from restaurants and cafeterias. Recently, researchers have found alternatives such as Bisabolane which perform more efficiently than vegitable oil and offer something closer to Road Diesel.

CodexEntry.name: Silicon Carbide Thyristors
CodexEntry.description: This fundemental componant of electrical devices manages the flow of electricity to ensure smooth operation. The use of Silicon Carbide increases the operating capability of the thyristor, enabling it to function in high heat and high voltage situations.

CodexEntry.name: Fish-Friendly Turbine
CodexEntry.description: This cutting edge turbine design reduces the risk of injury and mortality amongst fish populations traversing dammed rivers.

CodexEntry.name: Organic Flash Cycle (OFC)
CodexEntry.description: Using this newly developed approach, it is possible to reclaim waste heat from machinery and convert it back into usable energy.

CodexEntry.name: Integrated Ventilation Controller
CodexEntry.description: This new system maximizes the air quality within a residential home while reducing the energy consumed by 18 to 44%.

CodexEntry.name: Transition Metal Switchable Mirrors
CodexEntry.description: Transition Metal Switchable Mirrors enable the capability to change the reflectivity of a glass surface. this technology can be used to actively control natural light levels in a building or

CodexEntry.name: Electrochemical Solution Growth
CodexEntry.description: ESG allows us to grow large quantities of high quality Gallium Nitride Crystals which are used in high efficiency LEDs and high-power transistors.

CodexEntry.name: Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) Removal System
CodexEntry.description: This new system maximizes the air quality within a building while reducing the energy consumtion.

CodexEntry.name: Efficient Solar Cell Fabrication
CodexEntry.iconName: techImage_Process for Fabrication of Efficient Solar Cells
CodexEntry.description: With improved processes for the fabrication of solar cells, we can now increase the efficiency of solar panels by upping the light absorption capabilities of individual cells.

CodexEntry.name: Low-cost, Modular, Building-integrated Photovoltaic-Thermal Collector
CodexEntry.description: This method of capturing solar energy combines solar panels and thermal collectors. The resulting technology is then used as siding and roofing material for a building, turning each surface into an energy source.

CodexEntry.name: Hydrogen Storage
CodexEntry.description: Using acidic solutions, it is now possible to store Hydrogen in liquid form under mild conditions safely and without the need for mittens and scarves.

CodexEntry.name: Heat Transfer Interface for Thermo-Solar Energy
CodexEntry.iconName: Heat Transfer Interface for Thermo Solar Energy_01
CodexEntry.description: By adding thermal collectors to solar panels, it is possible to capture lost heat and increase the efficiency of solar panels.

CodexEntry.name: Efficient Polymer Solar Cells
CodexEntry.description: Scientists have increased the efficiency of solar cells by using a thin light absorbing material layered on a textured substrate.

CodexEntry.name: Energy Saving Absorption Heat Pump Water Heater
CodexEntry.iconName: techImage_Energy Saving Absorption Heat Pump Water Heater
CodexEntry.description: Description goes here...

CodexEntry.name: Super Energy Saver Heat Pump
CodexEntry.description: The Super Energy Saver Heat Pump technology is designed to improve the heating and cooling efficiency while decreasing energy consumption.

CodexEntry.name: Energy Efficient Laboratory Fume Hood
CodexEntry.description: Description goes here...

CodexEntry.name: Enhanced Oil Recovery
CodexEntry.iconName: Capturing Carbon Emissions to Increase Oil Production
CodexEntry.description: By pumping CO2 into the ground at oil extraction locations, output for crude oil at that location can be drastically increased.

CodexEntry.name: Tidal Power
CodexEntry.description: In recent years, engineers have developed a powerful system which harnesses the coming and going motion of tidal waters, converting that motion to useable energy.

CodexEntry.name: Waste to Energy
CodexEntry.description: Using consumer waste materials as fuel, this technology provides both a disposal method for garbage and a source of electricity.

CodexEntry.name: Combined Heat and Power
CodexEntry.description: This method combines standard electricity production with technology that recaptures thermal exhaust, increasing the energy output we can capture from a single source significantly.

CodexEntry.name: eGain Forecasting
CodexEntry.description: This system analyzes weather patterns and provides custom climate control for a building based op the weathers impact.

CodexEntry.name: Electric Car Charging Station
CodexEntry.description: Description goes here...

CodexEntry.name: Solar-Powered Airplanes
CodexEntry.description: Solar Powered Planes harness sunlight through solar panels on the wings and body which power electric motors.

CodexEntry.name: Alge Bio-Reactor
CodexEntry.description: Description goes here...

CodexEntry.name: MeterPlug
CodexEntry.description: Description goes here...

CodexEntry.name: Non-Invasive Energy Meter
CodexEntry.description: Description goes here...

CodexEntry.name: Liquid Metal Battery
CodexEntry.description: The Liquid Metal Battery is designed for low cost high capacity storage of electricity from Solar or Wind Power sources.

CodexEntry.name: Energy Storage With Plastic Bags
CodexEntry.description: By recycling waste plastic bags, we can create carbon nanotubes, a light super strong material which can be found in a variety of electronics and consumer products.

CodexEntry.name: Air Powered Cars
CodexEntry.description: Description goes here...

CodexEntry.name: Nuclear Power
CodexEntry.description: Introduced to the public in 50's, Nuclear Power Plants demonstrated to the public that Atomic Power could be used as a tool for good rather than war.

CodexEntry.name: Ethanol Fuel
CodexEntry.description: Ethanol is a grain alcohol that is found in both alcoholic beverages and Ethanol based Biofuels. Ethanol is a cheap renewable resource that produces roughly 66% of the energy as a gallon of Gasoline per gallon of Ethanol Fuel.

CodexEntry.name: Geothermal Power
CodexEntry.description: Like the blacksmith Vulcan of ancient Rome, we can now harness the Geothermal Energy of our home planet to provide renewable energy.

CodexEntry.name: Modular Nuclear Reactors
CodexEntry.description: This technology provides a small, efficient nuclear power plant at a significantly lower cost than that of a standard sized nuclear power plant.

CodexEntry.name: Silver Printing Method
CodexEntry.description: Description goes here...

CodexEntry.name: Microsolar Cells
CodexEntry.description: Microsolar cells require almost 100 times less silicon to produce than tradition cells and significantly lower manufacturing costs.

CodexEntry.name: Nuclear Waste Disposal
CodexEntry.description: Disposal of Nuclear Waste is an incredibly difficult task as the material is very dangerous. Currently, nuclear waste is stored at individual reactor sites and in geologically stable repositories carved deep into the earth.
